                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Keypoints

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Each non-zero αi indicates that the corresponding xi is a support vector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Each point that is not a support vector can be ignored because it has αi=0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Does not contribute to the summation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • The solution relies on an inner product between the test point x and the support vectors xi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Using only support vectors is extremely efficient at inference time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Solving the optimization problem involves computing inner products between all training points xiTx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • In practice

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • No need for the training data, but only for the dot product
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Fill a matrix with the products between all the possible pairs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        classifier is a hyperplane defined by SVs;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        training points appear only in inner products

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Summary – Linear SVM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Classifier is a separating hyperplane

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Most important training points are support vectors, they define the hyperplane

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Quadratic optimization algorithms can identify which training points are support vectors with non-zero αi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Keypoint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Both in the dual problem and in the solution, training points appear only inside inner products xiTxj
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Allows mapping to a higher dimensional space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Φ maps data to an higher dimensional space where they are linearly separable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Non linear SVM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Datasets that are linearly separable with some noise work out great

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • If the dataset is too hard, map data to a higher-dimensional space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          re

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • General idea: the original feature space can always be mapped to some higher-dimensional feature space where the training set is separable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        function equivalent to an inner product in a higher dimensional space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Kernel trick

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The linear classifier relies on inner product between vectors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          K(xi,xj)=xiTxj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • If every datapoint is mapped into high-dimensional space via some transformation Φ:x→φ(x), the inner product becomes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          K(xi,xj)′=φ(xi)Tφ(xj)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Kernel function: function that is equivalent to an inner product in some (higher dimensional) feature space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Implicitly maps data to a higher dimensional space with no need to compute each φ(x) explicitly

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example (Polinomial kernel)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 2-dimensional vectors x=[x1, x2]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Let K(xi,xj)=(1+xiTxj)2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Polinomial kernel

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Task: show that K(xi,xj)=φ(xi)Tφ(xj)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        K(xi,xj)=(1+xiTxj)2=1+xi12xj12+2xi1xj1xi2xj2+xi22xj22+2xi1xj1+2xi2xj2==[1xi12√2xi1xi2xi22√2xi1√2xi2]T[1xj12√2xj1xj2xj22√2xj1√2xj2]==φ(xi)Tφ(xj),   where  φ(x)=[1, x12, √2x1x2, x22, √2x1, √2x2]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Kernels

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        For some functions K(xi,xj) checking that K(xi,xj)=φ(xi)Tφ(xj) can be cumbersome

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Theorem (Mercer’s theorem)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Every positive semidefinite symmetric function is a kernel

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • A positive semidefinite symmetric functions correspond to a positive semidefinite symmetric Gram matrix

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Positive semidefinite symmetric matrix: if and only if all of its eigenvalues are non-negative

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Types of kernels

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Linear: K(xi,xj)=xiTxj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Polynomial of power p: K(xi,xj)=(1+xiTxj)p

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Gaussian (radial-basis function): K(xi,xj)=e−‖xi−xj‖22σ2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Mapping Φ:x→φ(x), where φ(x) is infinite-dimensional

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        In practice (Choose the kernel)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Try the linear, but generally avoid this one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Try the polynomial with different values of the hyper parameters (e.g. p and C)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. Try the gaussian (preferable with vectors)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        4. Compute the (huge) matrix K for all possible pairs of data points xi,xj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        any kind of data without losing information

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Non linear SVM problem with kernel trick

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Dual problem formulation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          maxα∑iαi−12∑i∑jαiαjyiyjK(xi,xj)s.t.   ∑iαiyi=0, αi≥0, ∀i

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Solution

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          f(x)=∑iαiyiK(xi,x)+b

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Optimization techniques for finding αi’s remain the same

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Advantages: could be used for any kind of data, also structured such as graphs, without losing information

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        11. Ranking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Multiclass VS Multilabel

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Basics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Goal: assign a discrete label to examples, with K>2 classes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • How: given a binary classifier, use it to solve a multiclass classification problem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        - multiclass: # x.labels = 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        - multilabel: # x.labels ∈ [0, inf)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Multilabel VS Multiclass classification

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Multiclass: each example has one label and exactly one label

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Multilabel: each example has zero or more labels

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        multiple binary classification problems

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Naive approach

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Joint learning: decompose the task as many independent binary classification problems

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ranking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Suggest a simpler word

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ranking problems in general

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        binary classifier:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        - predicts preferences
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        - turns them into ranking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Black box approach

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Use a generic binary classifier to solve ranking problem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Objective

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Train a classifier that predicts preferences
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Turn the predicted preferences into a ranking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        for each pair of examples, predict if first is better than second;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        combine features

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Predict better or worse

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Idea: train a classifier to decide if the first input is better than second

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Consider all possible pairings of the examples in a ranking
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Create new examples by combining features of each pair
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Label the new example as positive if the first example is higher ranked, negative otherwise

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Problem: the binary classifier only takes one example as input

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Solution: use features that compare the two examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        difference,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        grater/lower than

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Combined feature vector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Approaches: depending on domain and classifier

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Difference
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          fi′=ai−bi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Greater/Lower than

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            fi′={1ai>bi0otherwise

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Training

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Testing

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        label score for pairs ij

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Algorithm to recover the ranking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        foreach BinaryExample e_ij:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            label[i] += F(e_ij)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            label[j] -= F(e_ij)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        predict if xi is preferred
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        to xj wrt query q

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Preference function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Given: N queries and M samples in the training set

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • So far: single query

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Goal: train a binary classifier to predict a preference function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Objective

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Given: a query q and two samples xi and xj
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Classifier should predict whether xi should be preferred to xj w.r.t. query q

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        - train: forall q and (i,j), check if i is preferred to j on q - test: add/sub score f(x_ij) to score_i and score_j; return argsort(score)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Algorithm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Bipartite ranking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        predict a binary response

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Bipartite ranking problem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Bipartite ranking problem: try to predict a binary response

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example: is this document relevant or not?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Goal: ensure that all the relevant documents are ahead of all the irrelevant documents
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • No notion that one relevant document is more relevant than another

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        weight based on distance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Weighted binary classification

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Weight should reflect the distance in ranking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • In general we can weight with any consistent distance metric

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        confidence represents similarity between examples, used for ranking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Testing

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • If the classifier outputs a confidence, then we have learned a distance measure between examples
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • During testing we want to rank the examples based on the learned distance measure
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Sort the examples and use the output of the binary classifier as the similarity between examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ranking improved

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        preference function
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        for sorting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Preference function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. If the preferences are more nuanced[^fine distinct, sfumate] than “relevant or not”, incorporate these preferences at training time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Give a higher weight to binary problems that are very different in terms of preference than others

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. Use the preference function as the sorting function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Rather than producing a list of scores and then calling a sorting algorithm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        learn a function to predict position of new examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ranking function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Define a ranking as a function σ that maps the objects to the desired position in the list 1,2,...,M

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • If σu<σv then u is preferred to v
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Given: data with observed rankings σ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Goal: learn to predict rankings for new objects σ∗

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Define ΣM as the set of all ranking functions over M objects

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        define cost function to weight mistakes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cost function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Idea: model the fact that making a mistake on some pairs is worse than making a mistake on others

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Define a cost function ω, where ω(i,j) is the cost for accidentally putting something in position j when it should have gone in position i

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. Properties: valid cost function ω

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Symmetric  ω(i,j)=ω(j,i)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Monotonic   i<j<k ∨ i>j>k  ⇒  ω(i,j)≤ω(i,k)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Triangle inequality ω(i,j)+ω(j,k)≥ω(i,k)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        4. Depending on the problem, the cost function may be defined in different ways

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • If ω(i,j)=1 whenever i≠j, it simply counts the number of pairwise misordered items

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • We can impose only the top K predictions correct

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            w(i,j)={1min(i,j)≤K ∧ i≠j0otherwise
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Application: the web search algorithm may only display K=10 results to a user

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        minimize error calculated as sum of ω(σu, σv) s.t. ranking prediction is different than truth

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ω-ranking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Task (ω-ranking)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Given

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Input space X
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Unknown distribution D over X×ΣM
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Training set D sampled from D

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Compute

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Function f:X→ΣM minimizing

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            E(x,σ)∼D[∑u≠v1[σu<σv] 1[σ^v<σ^u] ω(σu,σv)]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Where σ^=f(x)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Loss

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • If the true ranking σ prefers u to v, but the predicted ranking σ^ prefers v to u, then the cost is ω(σu,σv)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        generate a training set made of triplets [x_uv, y=sign(σv-σu), w=ω(σu,σv)]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Training

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Generate a training set made of triplets (xuv, y=sign(σv−σu), w=ω(σu,σv))

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Weight each training example by how bad it would be to confuse it
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Take account of the errors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        quicksort with preference function as comparison

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Testing

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Run the quicksort algorithm, using the learned preference function as a (probabilistic) comparison function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Instead of predicting scores and then sorting the list

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Summary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Deterministic VS Probabilistic

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • A linear classifier can be used for the simplest implementation of a ranking model

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • This may suffice for bipartite ranking problem
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Deterministic approach

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • A more sophisticated ranking model can be developed by

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • introducing a cost function
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • devising[^conceive, draw up] a testing model based on a probabilistic version of quicksort

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        12. Decision Trees

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Introduction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example – Tennis match

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Binary classification problem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Columns: features
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Rows: labelled instances
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Class labels: a tennis match was played

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Decision tree

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Internal nodes: test one feature/attribute
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Branches: select one value for that attribute
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Leaf nodes: performs a prediction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Decision trees

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        routing and prediction functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Definition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Definition (Decision tree)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Tree-structured prediction model composed of

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Root node

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Non-terminal nodes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 2+ children
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Implement routing functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Terminal nodes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • No children (leaves)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Implement prediction functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Node(Φ, tL, tR) routes x,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Leaf(h) predicts h(x)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Operation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Idea

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Take an input x∈X
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Route it through its nodes until it reaches a leaf node
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. A prediction takes place in the leaf

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Theory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Assumption: binary trees

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Non-terminal Node(ϕ,tL,tR) holds

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Routing function ϕ∈{L,R}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Move to the left or right child depending on the value of ϕ(x)∈{L,R}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Left child tL

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Right child tR

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Terminal Leaf(h) holds: prediction function h∈Ftask
