                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Typically a constant (i.e. the label)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Depending on the task we want to solve it can be

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • h∈YX (e.g. classification or regression)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • h∈Δ(X) (e.g. density estimation)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Other

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Once x reaches the leaf, the final prediction is given by h(x)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Notation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Node(
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            φ1,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Node(
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                φ2,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Leaf(h1),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Leaf(h2)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Leaf(h3)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        recursive function
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        f_t = { h(x) | f_{t_{Φ(x)}}(x) }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Inference

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ft(x)={h(x)t=Leaf(h)ftϕ(x)(x)t=Node(ϕ,tL,tR)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • ft: recursive function returning the prediction for input x∈X according to the decision tree t

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        hyper-rectangular
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        regions with one label

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Decision boundaries

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • DTs divide the feature space into axis parallel hyper-rectangles
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Each rectangular region is labelled with one label

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example (Binary classification problem)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        find function f_t* of tree t* that minimizes E(f_t, D_n);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        grow tree with recursive partitioning

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Learning algorithm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Given: training set Dn={z1,…,zn}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Objective: find ft∗, where

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          t∗∈argmint∈TE(ft,Dn)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • T: set of decision trees

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Optimization problem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Easy (many solutions) if we do not impose constraints (e.g. most compact tree)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Otherwise it could be NP-hard

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Solution: simple greedy strategy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Assumption

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          E(ft,D)=1|D|∑z∈Dl(f,z)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Training: batch mode

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Algorithm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Fix: set of leaf predictions Hleaf⊂Ftask (e.g. constant functions)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Fix: set of possible routing (split) functions Φ⊂{L,R}X

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Tree-growing strategy that recursively partitions the training set

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • If the current set satisfies certain conditions grow a leaf
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Otherwise grow a non-terminal node

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Growing a DT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        grow a leaf if set is pure
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        or has low cardinality

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Growing a leaf

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Optimal leaf predictor: function that minimizes the error on a set

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Imputity I(D) of a set D: measure of the variability of the lables of set of examples D

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Training set reaching the node

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          D={z1,...,zm}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Optimal leaf predictor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          h∗∈argminh∈HleafE(h,D)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Optimal error value (impurity measure)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          I(D)=E(hD∗,D)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Conditions: grow a leaf Leaf(hD∗) if some criterion is met

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Purity I(D)<ε
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Minimum cardinality |D|<K
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Others

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • In practice: not all the criterion should be satisfied, so that trees can be more compact and generalized

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        grow a node with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        optimal Φ*

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Growing a node

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Definition (Impurity Iϕ(D) of a split function ϕ)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Lowest training error attainable by a tree consisting of a root and two leaves, computed in terms of the impurity of the split data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Iϕ(D)=∑d∈{L,R}|Ddϕ||D| I(Ddϕ)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • If no stopping criterion in met, find an optimal split function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ϕD∗∈argminϕ∈ΦIϕ(D)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Grow a Node(ϕ∗,tL,tR), where

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • ϕ∗ is the optimal split
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • tL and tR are obtained by recursively applying the learning algorithm to the associated training set splits

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        recursive function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Growing in a nutshell

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Grow(D)={Leaf(hD∗) if stopping criterion met Node(ϕD∗, Grow(DL∗), Grow(DR∗)) otherwise whereDd∗={(x,y)∈D, ϕD∗(x)=d}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Splitting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        maximize information gain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Split selection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The selection of the best split function could be given in the equivalent maximization of information gain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Instead of in terms of minimizing the impurity of the split

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Reduction of impurity induced by the split

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Δϕ(D)=I(D)−Iϕ(D)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Information gain is non negative

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Δϕ(D)≥0,  ∀ϕ∈{L,R}X,  D⊂X×Y

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • With this criterion the impurity will never increase for any randomly chosen split

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        h predicts only data that reach that leaf and returns a constant

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Leaf predictions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Leaf prediction provides a solution to a simplified problem involving only data reaching the leaf

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Solution

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Arbitrary function h∈Ftask
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • In practice: restrict h to a subset Hleaf of simple functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The simplest predictor is a function returning a constant (e.g. prefixed class label)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Set of all possible constant functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Hleaf=⋃y∈Y{y}X

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        classification error: impurity of the most frequent label

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Impurity measures for classification

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • For classification Y={c1,...,ck} and D⊂X×Y

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Let: Dy={(x,y′)∈D:y′=y} denotes the subset of training samples in D with class label y

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Consider: error function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          E(f,D)=1|D|∑z∈Dl(f,z)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Impurity measure could have different forms with different performance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Classification error

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            l(f,(x,y))=loss01(f,z) ∧ Hleaf=⋃y∈Y{y}X⇒I(D)=1−maxy∈Y|Dy||D|

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Entropy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            l(f,(x,y))=−log⁡fy(x) ∧ Hleaf =⋃π∈Δ(y){π}X⇒I(D)=−∑y∈Y|Dy||D|log⁡|Dy||D|
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Constant label distribution as leaf prediction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Gini impurity

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            l(f,(x,y))=∑c∈Y[fc(x)−1c=y]2 ∧ Hleaf =⋃π∈Δ(Y){π}X⇒I(D)=1−∑y∈Y(|Dy||D|)2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        variance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Impurity measures for regression

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • For regression Y⊂Rd and D⊂X×Y

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Impurity measure is the variance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          l(f,(x,y))=‖f(x)−y‖2 ∧ Hleaf=⋃y∈Y{y}X⇒I(D)=1|D|∑(x,y)∈D‖x−μD‖2μD=1|D|∑(x,y)∈Dx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        heterogeneous (discrete/continuous),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ordering (ordinal/nominal)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Data features/attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Each dimension could have

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Heterogeneous types of values (discrete/continuous)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Total ordering or not (ordinal/nominal)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1-dimensional splitting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Split/Routing functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The split/routing ϕ∈{L,R}X determines if a data point x∈X should move left or right

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The split functions are restricted to some predefined set Φ⊂{L,R}X depending on the feature space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The prototypical split function for a d-dimensional input

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Selects one dimension
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Applies a 1-dimensional splitting criterion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        partitions of K
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        in K_L and K_R

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Discrete nominal features

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Assumption: discrete nominal features taking values in K (e.g. colors, marital status, etc.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Idea: test all the possible partitions of K and assign to ϕ the one that minimizes the impurity

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Split function can be implemented given: partition of K into KL and KR

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ϕ(x)={Lx∈KLRx∈KR

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Finding the optimal split requires testing: 2|K|−1−1 bi-partitions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        partitions bases on threshold r∈K

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ordinal features

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Assumption: ordinal features (e.g. numbers, t-shirt sizes, etc.), taking values in K

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Split function can be implemented given: threshold r∈K

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ϕ(x)={Lx≤rRx>r

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Finding the optimal split requires testing

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • |K|−1 thresholds if |K|≤|D|
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Otherwise: sort the input values in D and test |D|−1 thresholds

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        consider multiple features

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Oblique

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Sometimes it is convenient to split using multiple features at once

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Such split functions can generate oblique decision boundaries

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Harder to optimize

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Assumption: continuous features

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Split function can be implemented given: x∈Rd ⇒ w∈Rd ∧ r∈R

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ϕ(x)={LwTx≤rRotherwise

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Final considerations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Basic algorithm: Top-Down learning

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ID3():  /* Iterative Dichotomiser 3 */
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            node = root of DT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            loop:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1. find the best decision attribute A (e.g. information gain) for the next node
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2. assign A as decision attribute for node
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3. foreach value of A, create a new descendant of node
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4. sort training examples to leaf nodes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                5. if training examples are perfectly classified, exit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   else, recurse over new leaf nodes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        pruning: optimization that replace a subtree by a leaf;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        reduce overfitting removing irrelevant attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Improving DTs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • DTs have a structure that is determined by the data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Consequence: they are flexible and can easily fit the training set, but with high risk of overfitting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Generalization and complexity

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Improving generalization: standard techniques

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Early stopping, regularization, data augmentation, complexity reduction, ensembling

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Reduce complexity: pruning a posteriori

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Pruning: replacing a whole subtree by a leaf node

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Overfitting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Many kinds of noise can occur in the training data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Incorrect values of attributes because of errors in the data acquisition process

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Instances labelled incorrectly

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Irrelevant attributes to the decision making process

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Large number of attributes could infer meaningless regularity in the data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Problem: overfitting the training data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Solution: remove irrelevant attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Manual process not always possible

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Summary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • DTs widely used in practice

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Strengths

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Fast at inference time
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Simple to implement
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Can convert a prediction to a set of rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Weaknesses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Univariate feature split
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Requires fixed-length feature vectors
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Non-incremental (i.e. batch method)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Decision Trees VS k-NN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Random forests

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        combine multiple models

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ensemble learning

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Combine multiple models

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Average models to reduce overfitting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Problems

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Only one training set
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Generate multiple models

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        draw new datasets from D

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Bagging: Bootstrap aggregation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Bootstrap sampling: given a set D containing N training examples, create D′ by drawing N examples at random with replacement from D

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • D′ contains repetitions of examples
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Elements of D′ are sampled with replacement (i.e. independent samples)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Procedure (Bagging)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Create k bootstrap datasets Di
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Train distinct classifier on each Di
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. Classify new instance by majority vote or average

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ensemble of DTs trained using bootstrap

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Random forests

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Random forest: ensembles of decision trees

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Each tree is typically trained on a bootstrapped version of the training set

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        randomity in splitting,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        averaging in prediction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Split functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Split functions are

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Optimized on randomly sampled features or

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Sampled completely at random

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Extremely randomized trees

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • This helps obtaining uncorrelated decision trees

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Final prediction obtained by averaging the prediction of each tree in the ensemble Q={t1,...,tT}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        fQ(x)=1T∑j=1Tft(x)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        create DTs on
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bootstrap samples
